p: In 2012, Chang et al. ( Chang et al., 2012) extracted 22 triterpenoids from Euphorbia neriifolia that show an anti-viral role against HCoV-229E ( Table S1). To this end, they performed anti-HCoV assays infecting viral susceptible MRC-5 fibroblast cells from lung, treating them with the extracted compounds for 2 h at 37 °C ( Chang et al., 2012).
